name: Tokhang Royale
description:
This game is a 4 man max multiplayer PVP.
Players will automatically be put in the field after inputting their name.
The game will start if another player joins a room. 

Made by:

  • Lead Designer/Programmer  - Xvyce
  • Programmer- ULTIMATUM9000
  • Lead Programmer/Artist - Grios
  • Artist/Programmer - orbitalrushem4
  • Sounds/Programmer - Winterprise
  • Lead Artist - Polydenta

Disclaimer: The game is still in a buggy state, though still playable.
